remarks: Prove existential uniqueness for an ordered triple.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-May-2015.)
statement:
euotd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. _V ) $.
euotd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. _V ) $.
euotd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. _V ) $.
euotd.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ( a = A /\ b = B /\ c = C ) ) ) $.
euotd $p |- ( ph -> E! x E. a E. b E. c ( x = <. a , b , c >. /\ ps ) ) $.
$d A a b c x $.
$d B a b c x $.
$d C a b c x $.
$d a b c ph x $.
